snippet: Most customers of Isaac’s Bake Shop in Midwood are drawn to its kosher fare, but it has a following among people tired of waiting to order at Di Fara Pizza across the street.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Isaac's Bake Shop, Midwood, Brooklyn, kosher bakery that caters to observant Jews.
lead_paragraph: Most customers of Isaac’s Bake Shop in Midwood are drawn to its kosher fare, but it has a following among people tired of waiting to order at Di Fara Pizza across the street.

headline.print_headline: For Observant Jews and Fidgety Pizza Fans
headline.main: A Brooklyn Bakery Appeals to Observant Jews and Pizza Fans
